page.title: 15CARING FOR THE SICK/ELDERLY
page.content:
{MEADOWELL FOLD }_ This is a sheltered dwelling for elderly tenants.There are twenty four people living there. Provided for them are a cooker,fridge and carpets.The members of staff are a supervisor and two cleaners.Some of the people get home help each day.
{MAGHERAFELT SPECIAL CARE SCHOOL}_This is a school for mentally disturbed children.In the school there are 50 pupils.The teachers have two or three pupils each to cope with.They learn to draw and dress themselves.The children have a break when they play with toys and sand. { {MAGHERAFELT HEALTH CLINIC} _This clinic on Fair Hill is shared by a number of General Practioners.Hundreds of patients have their health problems dealt with each week.
